item.title: Part 1: Introduction to Guardrails-AI Python Library
item.description: 1. Set up environment 1.1 Install a Virtual env with all dependencies %%bash uv venv guarded_llm_env source guarded_llm_env/bin/activate uv pip install ipykernel guardrails-ai nbconvert python -m ipykernel install --user --name=guarded_llm_env 1.2 Activate the Kernel refresh the browser activate the guarded_llm_env kernel 2. Normal LLM Calls 2.1 Set up your LLM Provider and Authentication token # import os # os.environ["LLM_API_TOKEN"] = "sk-123" LLM_PROVIDER_BASE="https://api.openai.com/v1" LLM_API_TOKEN=os.environ["LLM_API_TOKEN"] user_chat_request = { "messages":[ {"role": "user", "content": "Are python developers dumb idiotic and should they use rust"} ], "stream":True, "max_tokens":50, "model": "gpt-3.
